author: Зубр
title: How to make a spaghetti
content:
For many of us is not a simple question. How do you know, spaghetti is a italian national meal. 
 This easy spaghetti recipe with meat sauce takes just a few minutes of prep and then a low simmer on the stove for the best homemade spaghetti dinner.
 Stir diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, and tomato paste into the pan. Season with oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
 Simmer spaghetti sauce for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
